column12: Only 4 Homework assignments that count basically as quizzes. 3 Midterms and Cumulative final. Alot of formulas to memorize and little room for error since one mistake can determine a whole letter grade. Attending class is more vital than the slides since she only gives and solves practice problems in class.
5 homeworks and 3 exams for the whole sememster, you will find them pretty easy as long as you go to every class
